description:
Provides an Alicloud EIP Association resource for associating Elastic IP to ECS Instance, SLB Instance or Nat Gateway.

-> **NOTE:** `alicloud_eip_association` is useful in scenarios where EIPs are either
 pre-existing or distributed to customers or users and therefore cannot be changed.

-> **NOTE:** From version 1.7.1, the resource support to associate EIP to SLB Instance or Nat Gateway.

-> **NOTE:** One EIP can only be associated with ECS or SLB instance which in the VPC.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

InstanceId.description: The ID of the ECS or SLB instance or Nat Gateway.

InstanceType.description: The type of cloud product that the eip instance to bind.

PrivateIpAddress.description: The private IP address in the network segment of the vswitch which has been assigned.
